name: Niranjan Balasubramanian
content: Niranjan's Home page. Niranjan Balasubramanian Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science Stony Brook University niranjan at cs dot stonybrook dot edu Google scholar profile. About Research Publications Teaching Students Brief Bio Before joining Stony Brook, I was a post-doctoral researcher in the Turing Center in the University of Washington, where I worked closely with the Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence (AI2). I graduated with a PhD in Computer Science from the University of Massachusetts Amherst, advised by Prof. James Allan at the Center for Intelligent Information Retrieval (CIIR). Personal I am married to Aruna Balasubramanian. We collaborate sometimes: MobiRNN: Efficient Recurrent Neural Network Execution on Mobile GPU PrIA: A Private Intelligent Assistant FindAll TailEnder
